meals.description: Our Naga burger meal is not for the faint hearted. It is made with the world's hottest chilli, the Naga chilli. This meal is for those who love a challenge and can handle the heat. The meal comes with a side of fries and a drink.

Our smash burger meal is made with 100% beef patties, cheese, lettuce, tomato, onions and our special sauce. This meal is perfect for those who love a classic burger. The meal comes with a side of fries and a drink.

Our wing variety meal is perfect for those who love wings. The meal comes with 6 wings, 2 of each spice level. The wings are marinated in our special sauce and cooked to perfection. The meal comes with a side of fries and a drink.

Our chicken burger meal is made with 100% chicken breast, lettuce, tomato, onions and our special sauce. This meal is perfect for those who love a classic chicken burger. The meal comes with a side of fries and a drink.
